STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0xE4AA
STRING: When I tilted my head in confusion, Yukari furrowed her brow in annoyance.

LABEL: 0xE57B
STRING: 「Well, since we're searching in pairs, we'll have to keep up the pace.」

LABEL: 0xE5D8
STRING: 「...I think you're the one who should slow down a little...」

LABEL: 0xE683
STRING: 「If I could do that, I would.」

LABEL: 0xE6CE
STRING: What's with this defiance?

LABEL: 0xE6F2
STRING: 「Yukari-san, what's with you?」

LABEL: 0xE7A1
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0xE7C2
STRING: 「It seems like you were going around the ship earlier by yourself just fine.」

LABEL: 0xE885
STRING: 「Well... I was so upset that I didn't have time to be scared...」

LABEL: 0xE973
STRING: 「Anyway――」

LABEL: 0xE991
STRING: 「Could I ask you to walk a little faster?」

LABEL: 0xE9D4
STRING: 「No, well, that's fine, but...」

LABEL: 0xEA0A
STRING: 「It's just quite hard to keep up with your speed, Yukari-san.」

LABEL: 0xEA5D
STRING: 「――I understand.」

LABEL: 0xEAF0
STRING: With that, Yukari walked up to me slowly.

LABEL: 0xEB24
STRING: 「Huh, um, Yukari-san?!」

LABEL: 0xEB73
STRING: I didn't have time to protest.

LABEL: 0xEB95
STRING: In no time at all, I found Yukari wrapped around my arm.

LABEL: 0xEBE3
STRING: 「Hey, what's this about?」

LABEL: 0xEC80
STRING: 「Emergency measures.」

LABEL: 0xEC9E
STRING: 「Well, we're running out of time, so let's move.」

LABEL: 0xED04
STRING: She said that and started walking.

LABEL: 0xED28
STRING: No, this was no mere walk.

LABEL: 0xED62
STRING: Yukari was pushing forward at a speed that was closer to running than walking.

LABEL: 0xEDA2
STRING: And the fact that she was holding on to my arm made me start moving too.

LABEL: 0xEE65
STRING: 「Whoa!」

LABEL: 0xEE7F
STRING: As if being dragged along, I started running.

LABEL: 0xEEC1
STRING: ...I needed to do something.

LABEL: 0xEEFD
STRING: If I didn't, my arm would be ripped off at this rate.

LABEL: 0xEF25
STRING: I wasn't fast enough to catch up to Yukari, but her hold on my arm was too strong.

LABEL: 0xEF71
STRING: I frantically tried to free myself with my free left arm.

LABEL: 0xEFA7
STRING: 「Wait――」

LABEL: 0xF097
STRING: 「Shut up!」

LABEL: 0xF0B7
STRING: 「Don't startle me!」

LABEL: 0xF111
STRING: What the heck...?

LABEL: 0xF12B
STRING: While dragging me along, Yukari checked the women's restroom and the theater room.

LABEL: 0xF183
STRING: There was no sight of anyone in either.

LABEL: 0xF1A5
STRING: Her pace didn't slow down at all, nor did her hold on my arm weaken during our search.

LABEL: 0xF201
STRING: My arm was nearing its limit.

LABEL: 0xF229
STRING: I started to lose the feeling in my fingertips as I was constricted by the slender Yukari.

LABEL: 0xF289
STRING: In another ten minutes, my arm would...

LABEL: 0xF2B7
STRING: As I was jokingly thinking about it, Yukari stopped in front of a room.

LABEL: 0xF2FF
STRING: The restraints on my arm loosened.

LABEL: 0xF31D
STRING: I quickly pulled my arm out, just in time.

LABEL: 0xF3C1
STRING: 「Haaah...」

LABEL: 0xF3DF
STRING: I could feel the blood flowing into my arm again.

LABEL: 0xF40F
STRING: I never thought I'd be endangered like this during our search.

LABEL: 0xF449
STRING: I looked up at the door and saw the words "Emergency Room" written on it.

LABEL: 0xF53F
STRING: 「This is where Hiragino-sensei was a while ago...」

LABEL: 0xF583
STRING: 「Well, let's make sure.」

LABEL: 0xF626
STRING: The emergency room was unlocked.

LABEL: 0xF656
STRING: Hiragino must've left it that way during the chaos.

LABEL: 0xF68C
STRING: It was a smaller room.

LABEL: 0xF6A6
STRING: The facilities were simple, but I guessed the medicine and equipment were in the treatment room next to the emergency room.

LABEL: 0xF704
STRING: I discreetly checked the time on the clock embedded in the wall by the hallway.

LABEL: 0xF764
STRING: As I thought, it hadn't been that long.

LABEL: 0xF79C
STRING: A broken clock was unexpectedly unsettling in this situation.

LABEL: 0xF7DA
STRING: Yukari opened the door to the treatment room and immediately shook her head after looking around.

LABEL: 0xF892
STRING: 「There's no one here either, huh...」

LABEL: 0xF8CB
STRING: 「That's to be expected. Let's hurry onward.」

LABEL: 0xF904
STRING: Yukari said bluntly.

LABEL: 0xF920
STRING: As she extended her hand toward me, I flung my arms above my head to escape.

LABEL: 0xFAAB
STRING: 「What are you doing? Give me your hand.」

LABEL: 0xFADC
STRING: 「I'll be right behind you. Please don't do this.」

LABEL: 0xFB93
STRING: 「Are you sure you can keep up?」

LABEL: 0xFBC3
STRING: 「Yes, I'll be fine. Come on, let's go.」

LABEL: 0xFC65
STRING: We quickly left the emergency room behind and headed for the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0xFD12
STRING: ...The wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0xFD2C
STRING: I was feeling excited.

LABEL: 0xFD58
STRING: Finally, I could enter the wheelhouse... My original purpose in the front section was to go there.

LABEL: 0xFDC4
STRING: Yukari turned toward me and held her hand up to stop me.

LABEL: 0xFE7B
STRING: 「This is the wheelhouse... Unlike the previous rooms, this one's off-limits to ordinary passengers.」

LABEL: 0xFEE9
STRING: 「I believe I mentioned earlier that I'm the only one in possession of a keycard to the wheelhouse... So I ask for your understanding.」

LABEL: 0xFF6A
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0xFF80
STRING: Yukari forbade me from entering.

LABEL: 0xFFAE
STRING: What was this?

LABEL: 0xFFD0
STRING: This was my chance.

LABEL: 0xFFF8
STRING: I managed to resist the iron-willed Yukari.

LABEL: 0x1002C
STRING: 「...But this is an emergency, right?」

LABEL: 0x1005C
STRING: 「So isn't it fine if――」

LABEL: 0x1008B
STRING: 「No, there's no need.」

LABEL: 0x100AF
STRING: 「I'll just have a look inside and search the room as we've done so far.」

LABEL: 0x100E3
STRING: 「If anyone's inside, it'll be an attendant, so there's no danger at all.」

LABEL: 0x10134
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x101CB
STRING: 「Is there still a problem?」

LABEL: 0x1023D
STRING: As I nodded meekly, Yukari held up her keycard and walked into the room.

LABEL: 0x1028D
STRING: I saw her off...

LABEL: 0x102B1
STRING: The timing was perfect, but――

LABEL: 0x102DF
STRING: I was sure I'd get another chance eventually.

LABEL: 0x10309
STRING: Just because she checked the room this way didn't mean that the <SHEEP III> would suddenly start functioning.

LABEL: 0x1036A
STRING: Now that the ship had sunk, I expected it to stay that way for a while.

LABEL: 0x103B2
STRING: Yes, there would be plenty of opportunities...

LABEL: 0x103E6
STRING: Now was not the time for me to act selfishly.

LABEL: 0x10426
STRING: I wanted to avoid looking suspicious.

LABEL: 0x1046A
STRING: I clenched my fists tightly.

LABEL: 0x10492
STRING: There were things I had to do, so I had to be cautious...

LABEL: 0x1053C
STRING: ――When Yukari returned, she repeated the same line yet again.

LABEL: 0x10597
STRING: 「There was no one inside. Let's hurry on to the next one.」

LABEL: 0x105D2
STRING: She began walking away.

LABEL: 0x10629
STRING: But... So far we had yet to come across a single passenger...

LABEL: 0x1067D
STRING: I knew beforehand that there was little hope of finding them, but now that I was confronted with that reality, I couldn't help but feel helpless.

LABEL: 0x106F5
STRING: We were approaching the last door on the third floor.

LABEL: 0x1079B
STRING: 「This is...」

LABEL: 0x107C6
STRING: 「It's the library. The reference room, in other words.」

LABEL: 0x10895
STRING: She unlocked and opened the door.

LABEL: 0x108BF
STRING: The sensors should have reacted and lit the room up, but it seemed like it was already brightly illuminated.

LABEL: 0x1092A
STRING: 「Oh, the lights.」

LABEL: 0x1094D
STRING: 「I wonder if someone's――」

LABEL: 0x10A29
STRING: Before I could finish, I heard a clatter from inside the room.

LABEL: 0x10A7D
STRING: Gaaah!

LABEL: 0x10A99
STRING: Ouch, ouch, ouch!

LABEL: 0x10AB9
STRING: I could feel my right arm being constricted.

LABEL: 0x10ADB
STRING: Someone's ribs were digging into it.

LABEL: 0x10B01
STRING: The pain was so great that it made me look down at the cause.

LABEL: 0x10BC9
STRING: Yukari was there with tears in her eyes while complaining in silence.

LABEL: 0x10BFB
STRING: There was no sign of the previously strict chief attendant anymore.

LABEL: 0x10C33
STRING: Thud.

LABEL: 0x10CB1
STRING: Right then, with my arm fused with Yukari, I heard a sound again.

LABEL: 0x10CF3
STRING: Inside the library――

LABEL: 0x10D0B
STRING: Without a doubt――

LABEL: 0x10D27
STRING: ――There was "something" there.

LABEL: 0x10D4D
STRING: 「Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x10D6D
STRING: 「I'll go first.」

LABEL: 0x10DFB
STRING: I whispered, shook off Yukari, and forcefully stepped inside the library.

LABEL: 0x10E4D
STRING: I glanced sideways at her and saw that she had a stern look on her face.

LABEL: 0x10EB2
STRING: But what was a man, if not a shield for situations like this?

LABEL: 0x10EEE
STRING: I had no clue what was going to be there.

LABEL: 0x10F2A
STRING: Moreover, we were in the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x10F4E
STRING: It was a world beyond the reach of earthly providence――

LABEL: 0x10F78
STRING: Images from various books passed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x10FA2
STRING: Grotesque creatures...

LABEL: 0x10FC2
STRING: I crept forward, my footsteps faltering as I made my way inside the room.

LABEL: 0x10FF8
STRING: It was probably twice as big as the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x11026
STRING: Bookshelves and computer terminals made for browsing were lined up against the walls, and several desks were set up for reading purposes.

LABEL: 0x1107C
STRING: The interior was like that of a library, however――

LABEL: 0x110AA
STRING: 「...Is anyone there?」

LABEL: 0x110CE
STRING: I muttered instinctively.

LABEL: 0x110EE
STRING: There was no one inside.

LABEL: 0x1111A
STRING: Strange.

LABEL: 0x11132
STRING: Somewhere here, there was someone, or something――

LABEL: 0x111D7
STRING: Yukari tugged the hem of my shirt.

LABEL: 0x11214
STRING: 「Under the desk!」

LABEL: 0x11237
STRING: 「Under?」

LABEL: 0x11276
STRING: Yukari's whisper made me crouch down and look below a desk...

LABEL: 0x1133B
STRING: ...There!

LABEL: 0x11353
STRING: "Something" was curled up under the desk at the back of the room.

LABEL: 0x113E8
STRING: It was a strange figure moving in a mysterious way.

LABEL: 0x11413
STRING: I exchanged glances with Yukari and approached slowly to avoid being noticed.

LABEL: 0x11471
STRING: Step by step.

LABEL: 0x114FE
STRING: As the distance between us shortened, the shadow of this "something" became clearer and clearer.

LABEL: 0x11548
STRING: It looked like a blob of color.

LABEL: 0x1156E
STRING: The banquet of colors moved up and down like it was breathing.

LABEL: 0x115C4
STRING: The colors seemed almost cosmic in nature, but when I got closer, I could see that they were designed by human hands.

LABEL: 0x1162E
STRING: The many layers of fabric in different tones created a distinctly Japanese feel.

LABEL: 0x11670
STRING: This pattern looked familiar... Was it a kimono?

LABEL: 0x1169C
STRING: But who would wear such a prominent kimono in a submarine like this――

LABEL: 0x116E6
STRING: 「Tokiwa-san...?」

LABEL: 0x11762
STRING: When I called out, the "thing" jolted――

LABEL: 0x117C7
STRING: and started to move around slowly, like a snail.

LABEL: 0x11885
STRING: She crawled out from under the desk, turned around, and threw her arms wide open.

LABEL: 0x1195E
STRING: 「I've been found! It's game over!」

LABEL: 0x119A4
STRING: 「Now, feel free to do with me as you please!」

LABEL: 0x11A3E
STRING: I thought that time had stopped.

LABEL: 0x11A66
STRING: What was she talking about with a straight face... Or rather, what was she doing here in the first place?

LABEL: 0x11B2A
STRING: Tokiwa stood motionless like a horse mackerel or an insect specimen, holding her chest out.

LABEL: 0x11B7A
STRING: She had a triumphant expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x11B90
STRING: ...What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0x11BAE
STRING: As I stood there dumbfounded, a figure stepped forward from my shadow.

LABEL: 0x11BF2
STRING: It was Yukari who brought me back to my senses.

LABEL: 0x11CFB
STRING: 「Come over here, please.」

LABEL: 0x11DA1
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0x11DBC
STRING: After receiving instructions from a serious-looking Yukari, Tokiwa brought down her hands and lined up in front of her quietly.

LABEL: 0x11E12
STRING: Yukari then turned to face me.

LABEL: 0x11EC6
STRING: 「Well then, let's head back to the second floor.」

LABEL: 0x11EF3
STRING: I simply nodded in silence.

LABEL: 0x11F87
STRING: Yukari inclined her head, puzzled, and briskly left the library behind.

LABEL: 0x12037
STRING: Her small retreating figure looked so dependable...

LABEL: 0x12071
STRING: I couldn't believe she was the same person who'd been so scared earlier.

LABEL: 0x120AF
STRING: Following behind her was the strange girl we'd just discovered.

LABEL: 0x120F9
STRING: Calling their pace fast was an understatement.

LABEL: 0x12131
STRING: In reality, it was even worse.

LABEL: 0x12161
STRING: I was surprised that she could make Tokiwa match her own pace this quickly.

LABEL: 0x121AB
STRING: The most terrifying thing on this ship was probably Momoi Yukari herself...
